name: A Shadow’s Tale™
description: Journey into a unique world of light and dark, in the groundbreaking action adventure A Shadow’s Tale. You are a shadow, separated from your body imprisoned at the top of a mysterious tower. Every shadow becomes a surface you can touch, leading to an original gameplay experience. In your two-dimensional form, summon the help of a fairy to interact with the physical world; moving objects to cast shadows to use as walkways; and watch out for enemies along the way – because even shadows can be hurt!
